hero.title: Turkmen Travel International Exhibition
hero.description: 'Turkmen Travel' is an international exhibition dedicated to the development of tourism in Turkmenistan, held in Ashgabat. It brings together travel agencies, hotels, airlines, and tour operators from around the world to present tourist destinations, develop partnerships, and promote the country's cultural and natural attractions.

cards.title: Travel Agencies & Tour Operators
cards.description: Discover exclusive Silk Road routes, Avaza beach packages, and partner with local operators to create unique Central Asian itineraries for your clients.

cards.title: Hotels & Resorts
cards.description: Showcase your property to international buyers and explore joint ventures in Turkmenistan’s expanding eco-lodge and wellness tourism sectors.

cards.title: Airlines & Transport Providers
cards.description: .Connect with tourism boards to promote new flight routes and seamless ground transfers linking Europe, Asia, and the Middle East via Ashgabat.

cards.title: Travel Bloggers & Influencers
cards.description: Get first-hand access to hidden gems like the Darvaza Gas Crater and ancient Merv—perfect for creating viral content and sponsored collaborations.
